div.style: width:872px;background: #ececec; border-radius: 6px;-moz-border-radius: 6px; border-radius: 6px; margin:0px; margin-bottom:20px; padding:9px; box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px #888888;

span.strong: All Rochester Community Schools, to include all athletic fields, are closed until further notice following the governor's executive order in response to the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic. The Administration Building is closed to the general public. All School-Age Care (SAC) and Teen Enrichment Activities for Middle School (TEAMS) programs are closed until further notice.

div.style: float:left; width:580px;height:298px; margin:0px; background: #ececec; border-radius: 6px;-moz-border-radius: 6px; border-radius: 6px; padding:9px; box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px #888888;
position:relative; float:left; width:141px; text-align:left; margin-left:4px; padding-right:4px;padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:3px; border-bottom: 1px solid #808080;
position:relative; float:left; width:141px; text-align:left; margin-left:4px; padding-right:0px; padding-top:6px; padding-bottom:0px;
div.p: To provide a quality education in a caring atmosphere for students to attain the necessary skills and knowledge to become lifelong learners and contribute to a diverse, interdependent and changing world.

div.style: position:relative; float:left; width:141px; text-align:left; margin-left:4px; padding-right:4px;padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:3px; border-bottom: 1px solid #808080;
position:relative; float:left; width:141px; text-align:left; margin-left:4px; padding-right:0px; padding-top:6px; padding-bottom:0px;
div.p: Ensuring a world-class education by focusing resources on developing and enhancing assets which include people, innovative partnerships, state-of-the-art technology and facilities.

div.style: position:relative; float:left; width:141px; text-align:left; margin-left:4px; padding-right:4px;padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:3px; border-bottom: 1px solid #808080;
position:relative; float:left; width:141px; text-align:left; margin-left:4px; padding-right:0px; padding-top:6px; padding-bottom:0px;
div.p: Challenging students through dynamic cultural experiences to be empowered global stewards, and inspiring them to have a positive impact on their community, country, and world.

div.style: position:relative; float:left; width:141px; text-align:left; margin-left:4px; padding-right:4px;padding-top:0px; padding-bottom:3px; border-bottom: 1px solid #808080;
position:relative; float:left; width:141px; text-align:left; margin-left:4px; padding-right:0px; padding-top:6px; padding-bottom:0px;
div.p: Developing innovative, self-directed learners who think critically, communicate effectively, and persevere to positively impact the world.

div.style: float:left; width:258px; height:298px; margin:0px; margin-left:16px; background: #ececec; border-radius: 6px;-moz-border-radius: 6px; border-radius: 6px; padding:9px; box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px #888888;

p.span: The health and safety of our students, staff, and community is our highest priority. We are committed to providing our families with updates as new information about the coronavirus, COVID-19, becomes available. Please continue to check our website by going to: https://bit.ly/3cSM9WM. During this fluid and unprecedented time, your support, flexibility, and patience is appreciated as we work to ensure the safety of our students and staff. We will continue to update the community.

div.style: width:872px;background: #ececec; border-radius: 6px;-moz-border-radius: 6px; border-radius: 6px; margin:0px; margin-bottom:20px; padding:9px; box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px #888888;

div.p: With the governor’s stay-at-home executive order to combat the spread of the coronavirus, COVID-19, RCS is moving to an online registration platform. Please visit our Enrollment page to enroll and for further information regarding Online Registration.

Beginning the week of April 6, 2020, meals will be distributed on Monday and Wednesday only. Three days of meals will be provided on Monday, and two days of meals will be provided on Wednesday. Pick up times will continue from 10:30 to 11:30 a.m. at the school that families designated for pick-up. Families who picked up meals at Musson Elementary will now pick up meals at Brewster Elementary. Families who picked up meals at University Hills Elementary will now pick up meals at Meadowbrook Elementary.

If families no longer require food service meals, we ask they email us at: focfs@rochester.k12.mi.us, and provide the family name, number of students, and the location that was designated for pick up.
The RCS 2020-21 school calendar is available via this link. Please note that school will start on Monday, August 31, 2020. The printed booklet of the calendar will be available in September.
div.h3: Coronavirus Community Update - Remote Learning at RCS
div.p: Through teamwork and partnerships, we will continue to connect with our students and provide them with the love and support needed to get through this unprecedented situation. We are committed to providing our families with updates as new information about the coronavirus, COVID-19, becomes available. For more information, go to: https://bit.ly/3cSM9WM.

div.style: width:872px;background: #ececec; border-radius: 6px;-moz-border-radius: 6px; border-radius: 6px; margin:0px; margin-bottom:20px; padding:9px; box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px #888888;

div.p: We are pleased to announce that online registration is now open for Kindergarten! Use this link to register your child or go to: https://rcsvue.rochester.k12.mi.us/PXP2_OEN_Login.aspx. Students that are currently enrolled in the 2019/20 school year Transitional Kindergarten (TK) program will automatically be transitioned to their home school for the 2020/21 Kindergarten program. You DO NOT need to re-enroll if they are a current TK student in Rochester Community Schools. You will be notified in the summer to update your information via ParentVUE for the 2020-21 school year.
For further information, visit the Enrollment page or go to our website at: https://www.rochester.k12.mi.us/pages/353/enrollment.
To see what a day in the life of a Kindergarten student at RCS looks like, please enjoy the video below. We look forward to welcoming your student to the Rochester Community School family.
